00014 /*
00015   Функторы
00016  ----------
00017  Для поиска элемента массива по полю в структуре.
00018  Использование:
00019                 ...
00020                 struct Foo
00021                 {
00022                         wxString name;
00023                 }
00024                 struct FindByName
00025                 {
00026                         FindByName(wxString name) : value(name) {}
00027                         bool operator () (const Foo& foo) { return foo.name == value; }
00028                         wxString value;
00029                 };
00030 
00031                 std::vector<Foo> v;
00032                 std::vector<Foo>::iterator found_it = std::find_if(v.begin(), v.end(), FindByName("Hello"));
00033                 ...
00034 */
00035 
00036 struct TypeByName
00037 {
00038         TypeByName(wxString name) : toFind(name) {}
00039         bool operator () (const ComponentType& type) { return type.name == toFind; }
00040         wxString toFind;
00041 };
00042 
00043 struct PatternByName
00044 {
00045         PatternByName(wxString name) : toFind(name) {}
00046         bool operator () (const Pattern& patt) { return patt.pattern == toFind; }
00047         wxString toFind;
00048 };
00049 
00050 struct FidMarkByName
00051 {
00052         FidMarkByName(wxString name) : toFind(name) {}
00053         bool operator () (const FidMark& fidmark) { return fidmark.designator == toFind; }
00054         wxString toFind;
00055 };
00056 
00057 struct CompByIndex
00058 {
00059         CompByIndex(int idx) : toFind(idx) {}
00060         bool operator () (const Component& comp) { return comp.index == toFind; }
00061         int toFind;
00062 };

00066 struct XmlNodePtrs
00067 {
00068         wxXmlNode *parent;
00069         wxXmlNode *last_child;
00070         XmlNodePtrs() : parent(NULL), last_child(NULL) {}
00071 };

00075 struct ItemTemplate
00076 {
00077         wxString type;
00078         wxString delimiter;
00079         wxString format;
00080         bool skipHeader;
00081 
00082         ItemTemplate(wxString t, wxString d, wxString f, bool skip)
00083                 : type(t), delimiter(d), format(f), skipHeader(skip)
00084         {
00085         }
00086 };
